name: Talking Tom Blast Park: The New Blasting Adventure
name_original: Talking Tom Blast Park: The New Blasting Adventure
description:
Talking Tom Blast Park: The New Blasting Adventure is a upcoming new game about talking tom

Can used to play Tom, Angela, Ginger, Hank and Ben

Talking Tom Blast Park: The New Blasting Adventure was announced in july 2019, after announced, said if will came out in december 2019, but on started production, new date is mid-april 2020, but on march 2020, has delayed to october due to coronavirus pandemic.
